value.name: After 'frustrating' year at Marquette, Jose Perez moving to Manhattan College
value.description: After just one season with the Marquette men's basketball team, Jose Perez is headed home. The 6-foot-5 junior guard announced Sunday that he was transferring to Manhattan College. Perez is a New York City native who previously played two seasons at Gardner-Webb.

value.name: Employee Dies After Fall At Manufacturing Plant
value.description: Rodriguez, 66, of Waukegan fell about 20 feet from a lift at Handi-Foil in Antioch Wednesday evening, authorities said.

value.name: Norman man gets 6 life sentences for child crimes
value.description: A Norman man received six life sentences Monday on counts including rape, child sexual abuse and child abuse, plus other sentences on four additional charges, all to run consecutive. Cleveland County District Judge Thad Balkman sentenced Jose Perez Manarang Jr.

value.name: Free event to expunge charges from records set for June 25
value.description: The Robeson County Offender Resource Department has scheduled a free event in June for the purpose of expunging felony and misdemeanor charges from the records of qualifying applicants.
